game.name: Battle Survival Zombie Apocalypse
game.description:
Are you again ready to witness another zombie apocalypse? If yes, join Battle Survival Zombie Apocalypse game and get ready to enter the biggest battle ground where challenging your intense fighting skills will only help to survive till end. No need to lose your patience when you see these blood-thirsty souls otherwise they kill you immediately. Grab your weapon and start killing all of them to complete all your missions in this brand new action game!
Be careful as zombies can come from different directions. The entire battle ground is full of dangerous monsters that do not have pity on their heart. Run fast and try to kill every moving object that tries to stop you from moving forward. After all, it is a matter of survival so fight until your last breath and get the victory over these deadly souls. Select from the boys and girls team and enter a great battle against zombies in this third person 3D shooting game!
You can finish this game only when you complete all missions in each level. There are many hours of game play as this cool html5 shooter game features forty-five levels. Keep killing zombies and grabbing the coins or money through which you can buy new characters and advanced weapons later. Complete missions to improve your rank in this one of the best fighting games for boys! Different maps to explore, unique characters to play with online for free, no download required.
